author: Aaron Weaver
title: Meghan Markle Officially Owns Prince Harry – ‘Forbids’ Him From Visiting Father
description: Prince Harry wanted to see his father, Prince Charles, after learning of his coronavirus infection, but Meghan Markle "forbade" him. It begs the question: who's really in charge here? The post Meghan Markle Officially Owns Prince Harry – ‘Forbids’ Him From Vi…
content:
